extension_description.message: Shandura mavara akasarudzwa papeji rewebhu woshandura kuti aende kufomati yakatarwa.

turn_off_description.message: Bhatani rekushandura rinobuda pese panosarudzwa mavara

turn_on_description.message: Bhatani rekushandura harisi kuzoonekwa kana mavara asarudzwa asi unogona kushandura nekudzvanya chiratidzo chePro Translate chiri mutoolbar

auto_switch_description.message: Kana mavara akasarudzwa ari iwo mutauro wenguva dzose, shandura uchiuisa mumutauro wechipiri waunonongedza

target_format_description.message: Sarudza iyo inotarirwa fomati, fomati inogona kuchinjwa mushanduro yepaneli

auto_set_format_description.message: Paunenge uchichinja fomati mupaneri yekushandura, isa iyo yakasarudzwa fomati kune yakasarudzika fomati

format_and_order_description.message: Fomati makesi anogona kuchinjwa mushanduro yepaneli uye kurongeka kwekuratidzira

translate_button_on_description.message: Bhatani rekushandura rinobuda pese panosarudzwa mavara

translate_button_off_description.message: Bhatani rekushandura harisi kuzoonekwa kana mavara asarudzwa asi unogona kushandura nekudzvanya chiratidzo chePro Translate chiri mutoolbar
